title: Value of RB Position + Lincoln Riley on Baker Mayfield, Kyler Murray & Jalen Hurts
itunes:title: Value of RB Position + Lincoln Riley on Baker Mayfield, Kyler Murray & Jalen Hurts
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the duo look at the value of the running back position and specifically focus on Minnesota Vikings running back Dalvin Cook since he wants a new contract (1:07). Next, the guys are joined by Oklahoma head football coach Lincoln Riley as he talks about the former Oklahoma quarterbacks he's coached, the talented wide receivers that have come out of Oklahoma and much more (7:53). To wrap up the show, the pair discuss the main points from the interview (24:43).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
